dct_title_s: Spezial Karte von dem KÃ¶nigreiche Taurien
dct_alternative_sm: Special map of the Kingdom of Taurias or the Crimean peninsula
dct_description_sm: Map of the Crimean Peninsula showing numerous historical details, including the fortifications at Perekop, the yet-to-be-filled channel at "Ienitschi," "Karasbasar" insated of "Simferopol," and many coastal names that remain unchanged today. Cartouche in upper right has the title on a drum in the sea, surrounded by flags, waves, and an anchor.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
